description_for_human: A free macOS app that turns documentation into Claude Code plugins and skills.
description_for_model: PluginSmith is an open-source macOS developer tool for creating Claude Code plugins. It imports documentation (Markdown, PDF, Word, Excel, URLs), uses AI to suggest plugin structure, and generates production-ready plugins with commands, skills, agents, hooks, and MCP servers. Free under MIT License. Requires user's own Anthropic API key.
